title: Presence of Mind is SO OP ON KARTHUS
body:
thoughts on the above?
i like the ability to use e to push the wave when you level up to allow for easier roam potentials
it also solves needing blue for extended fights, get one assist and you get FREE MANA FOR 7 SECONDS

replies.body: Dead champ, dead post lol. Did you know you also get FREE MANA when in karthus passive so spam to your heart's contents. Anyway great for pushing,clearing, trash for teamfights unless tank.
you play lissandra so I dont think you have much room to talk about dead champs lol

When i used to spam karthus more, the extra mana in team fights as people started to die around you really helped with staying useful in team fights when e is draining your mana, i don't really play to die on karthus
It is also really good in 2v1 situations or when roaming and a counter gank comes in
only downside is you need to go balls deep and get the kill or its meh

He's pretty cheesy with ProM early game all ins, and pretty deceptive if you can correctly time your lvl up 4 xp away  while 0 mana baiting strats, idk I feel like a mid to late game champ like that deserves better than having to go into the precision tree, the auto attackers tree... ~~hmm, maybe it is viable as a constant aoe to be hitting em with autos instead of pressing q. ~~ to get some free mana every take down/lvl up when by like you're 1st-3 backs you prob already got the mana issue a bit more room to clear{{item:1056}} {{item:1027}} {{item:3802}} {{item:3010}}  {{item:3070}} biscuits, flowband etc..  But I'm sure with ProM it's pretty fun having a constant e up all the time moving instead of you know being in passive, it always  feels in a good way dumb for both sides that you killed someone so "skillfully" with your aoe aura up that you just casually glided next to just wailing WOOOOOOW like owen wilson as they try to dodge your qq's but you never threw out a single 1.
